Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller.server.lobby

Interface ILobby

All Superinterfaces:
Service
All Known Implementing Classes:
ConcreteLobby, Lobby
public interface ILobby extends Service
interface through which the server interacts with the lobby the commands' behaviour depends on the lobby current state

  • Method Details

    • onAddPlayer

      void onAddPlayer(Connection sender) throws ServerException
      a player wants to join
      Parameters:
      sender - player who wants to join
      Throws:
      ServerException - thrown for a variety of reasons, but mostly because: - somebody with the same name is already inside the lobby - the lobby is full (i.e.: the game is currently on) - the game is in stand-by but the player is not an original player

    • onRemovePlayer

      void onRemovePlayer(Connection toRemove)
      a player wants to leave
      Parameters:
      toRemove - player to remove

    • onExecuteCommand

      void onExecuteCommand(PlayerVisitorCommand command) throws ServerException
      a player wants to make a game move
      Parameters:
      command - command to execute
      Throws:
      ServerException - can be thrown for a variety of reasons, but mostly because the game has yet to start or is currently paused
